bug.author: hamzaraza06
bug.description:
hi guys i am facing issue with FPS when ever i click on game window my fps drops to around 10fps and when i click on console window fps boost to 60fps. In other words when my game window is in focus fps drops to 10 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35335528/53735786-b8a92a00-3ea9-11e9-8a90-7ccb114532c9.PNG></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35335528/53735788-b941c080-3ea9-11e9-8094-eea5a6a7891d.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi, I'm sorry for my late reply. This looks like a bug related to framerate calculation. I will fix it and update here!
Fixed in the latest commit. Please, let us know if you still face this error.

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZiuTinyat>@ZiuTinyat</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gineshidalgo99>@gineshidalgo99</denchmark-link> issue has been fixed. Now i have constant 12.5 fps is this due to camera or still their is some issue ? should i upgrade my camera?

Then I should close the issue. About low camera FPS, that's already opened in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose_unity_plugin/issues/2>#2</denchmark-link> . We will update in there after it is fixed, we hope to fix that one within the next 1-2 weeks. Best
